entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Toolbar overlaps with Android notification bar #6392
  • Picker width on Windows not filling container #6391
    6.0.300
  • Make Shell compatible with the other page types in .NET MAUI #6389
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Negative Padding values fail #6387
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CollectionView on Android does not show new objects if it starts with 0 objects #6386
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout has no height in ListView #6380
    6.0.300
  • Image AspectFill not working #6378
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ListView ItemsSource refreshing problems in Windows and Android, Button double activating before DisplayAlert popup #6377
    6.0.300
  • BorderColor does not work on visualStateManager #6370
    6.0.300
  • RC1 - Shell - Bottom tabs do not work in Windows and the icon is not displayed #6369
    .NET 7
  • Text bounces while invalidating the Drawable #6368
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Expected Style but found Microsoft.Maui.Controls.DataTrigger. #6367
    6.0.300
  • RC1 - DeviceStateTrigger Device not work #6366
    6.0.300
  • RC1 - Image with AspectFill does not appear inside some Layouts #6365
    6.0.300
  • RC1 - EllipseGeometry does not work #6363
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Shell on Android: Icons not Shown (RC1) #6361
    6.0.300
  • ClearButtonVisibility is not working #6360
    6.0.300
  • CarouselView SnapPointsType not working on Windows #6356
    6.0.300
  • Enable the ability to include default styles alongside Maui Controls #6350
    6.0.300
  • TabbedPage running on Android Emulator - Unhandled Exception #6349
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Follow up TOOD list for CA1416 analysis result #6348
    6.0.300
  • Blazor WebView iOS Scrolling Behaves Strangely #6347
    6.0.300

Closed

  • Shell on iOS: icons are not scaled #6331
  • Shell on iOS: completly black screen with .svg files in xaml #6332
  • [Bug] Essentials Connectivity throws on older macOS versions #3164
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Not correctly rendering complex Paths (using multiple Paths) #4049
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Remap the existing IBorderElement properties so they propagate to the new Border Property #2253
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Border with RoundRectangle doesn't use CornerRadius or Clip content #2694
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Bug] Make sure single project builds without WinUI installed #1895
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Latest update broke build on all working maui/ blazor solutions #6336
  • Default MAUI project cannot be launched for Windows #6111
  • Resizetizer does not put things in standard locations #3271
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Xamarin.Android] Performance decrease when compared with Xamarin.Forms #822
  • Changing ApplicationDisplayVersion in csproj causes problems #6351
  • Create XPlat default theme to revert defaults to #1704

PullRequests

Created

  • Throw exception if users uses incompatible pages #6390
  • Fix FlyoutIsPresented permutations #6388
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Adds FlowDirection Design TypeConverter #6384
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • feat: added Visibility property for UWP compatibility #6381
  • [X] Properly restore styleValue after ClearValue #6379
  • [Android] Fix crash in TabbedPage (using it under Shell) #6374
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/TabbedPage
  • Fix the BackgroundColor to Background update #6372
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Use .NET 6 built-in dotnet format tool #6371
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Core] Fix issue not finding IAnimationManager #6364
    t/bug, area/animation 🎬
  • Attempt to stabilize image handler tests #6359
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Use a variable for the Svg.* package versions #6355
  • Bump System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe from 4.7.1 to 6.0.0 #6354
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.DesignTools.Extensibility from 16.9.31025.104 to 17.1.32210.191 #6353
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump BenchmarkDotNet from 0.12.1 to 0.13.1 #6352
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Update template styles #6312
    area/Xaml </>, area/a11y, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Update `maui-blazor` template to enforce Android 23+ #6382
    area/blazor 🕸️, 6.0.300
  • [X] Remove hacks for StaticResourceExtension #6065
    area/Xaml </>
  • [C] remove Font usage from Controls #5664
    area/controls 🎮
  • Bump NUnit3TestAdapter from 4.0.0 to 4.2.1 #6301
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • [VSM] correctly unapply AppTheme from Setters #6362
  • Bump MSBuild.Sdk.Extras from 3.0.23 to 3.0.44 #6307
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 3.141.0 to 4.1.0 #6286
    dependencies
  • Bump SkiaSharp from 2.88.0-preview.127 to 2.88.0-preview.256 #6296
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
    do-not-merge
  • Handle CA1416 violations found in MAUI repo #6237
  • Fix Toolbar property calculation when you have nested Nav Pages #6326
    area/navigation 🧭, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge, .NET 7
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Updated Default project template title #6319
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • Bump NUnit from 3.13.2 to 3.13.3 #6274
    dependencies
  • [Windows] Fix crash using SwipeView inside CollectionView #6220
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/SwipeView
  • [Housekeeping | Windows] Revert changes in Button focus default behavior #6234
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-button
  • Generate MSIX when publishing #6262
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Add VC Redist dependency to Windows templates #6318
    platform/windows 🪟, area/publishing 🏁, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [android] remove ColorStateList(int[][],int[]) usage #5654
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7
  • Correctly notify changes in the Page BackgroundColor property #5706
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Windows] Implement FlyoutHeaderBehavior property #5345
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix incorrect clipping using RoundRectangleGeometry #5708
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Handle content hiding separately for hot restart scenarios #6341
    area-blazor, area/tooling ⚙️
  • Bump Microsoft.Build from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6344
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1020.30 to 1.0.1185.39 #6308
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, .NET 7
  • Fix SwipeItems.CollectionChanged sender issue #6342
    t/bug, area/SwipeView
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Bump Svg.Custom from 0.4.1 to 0.5.0 #6320
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Build.Framework from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6338
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Core from 15.9.20 to 17.1.0 #6281
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • Allow closing of windows when using a MainPage #6316
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.300-rc.3
